title: In which I explain the silence
author: VD
content_html:
I haven’t been very posty today, mostly because I’ve been looking into what may – and I do stress the word “may” – be one of the most shameless attempted ripoffs in the game industry that I’ve ever seen. And that’s saying something, if you know some of the companies with which I’ve worked in the past.

Anyhow, a few of the facts are yet unclear so I won’t say anything more about it now, although all the news is actually out there on the Net so theoretically it might just barely be possible to figure out what I’m alluding to here. So, If you’re bored or need a break from Rothbard, do feel free to take a few wild stabs at it.

UPDATE – Upon further review, everything is kosher. No ripoff, no problem. More on this in a few months.

I haven’t been very posty today, mostly because I’ve been looking into what may – and I do stress the word “may” – be one of the most shameless attempted ripoffs in the game industry that I’ve ever seen.  And that’s saying something, if you know some of the companies with which I’ve worked in the past.
Anyhow, a few of the facts are yet unclear so I won’t say anything more about it now, although all the news is actually out there on the Net so theoretically it might just barely be possible to figure out what I’m alluding to here.  So, If you’re bored or need a break from Rothbard, do feel free to take a few wild stabs at it.
UPDATE – Upon further review, everything is kosher.  No ripoff, no problem.  More on this in a few months.
